algorithm_technique: Sorting and finding maximum differences between adjacent elements
problem_summary_simple: Find the largest rectangular piece of cake after making horizontal and vertical cuts.
problem_summary_technical: Sort cuts, find max difference between adjacent horizontal and vertical cuts, multiply for max area.
time_complexity: O(h log h + w log w)
key_insights: The problem decomposes into finding the maximum gap between horizontal cuts and the maximum gap between vertical cuts independently.
Sorting the cuts is essential to easily find these maximum gaps.
The maximum area is the product of the maximum horizontal gap and the maximum vertical gap.
